title: log4j JNDI Exploitation
snippet: SituationA remote code execution (RCE) bug was found in log4j. CVE 2021-44228 has been assigned to it. The vulnerability lies in how log4j interprets Java Naming and Directory Interface (JNDI) URLs. JNDI lets an application look up a service. An attacker can craft a string that looks like “${jndi...

title: Security Onion on Proxmox
snippet: Security Onion on ProxmoxI originally set up my homelab using Ovirt, but have since switched back to Proxmox. title: Investigating DoH
snippet: DNS SecurityAs a plain-text protocol, DNS lacks Confidentiality, Integrity, and Availability (CIA) protections. An attacker who can observe DNS activity can see where the DNS request originated from, where responses came from, what the query and response were, or tamper with the response.DNS over...
